    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    AdministratorCtrl
    AdministratorCtrl manages hospital staff, appointments, and medication inventory.
    AdministratorInput
    The AdministratorInput class manages the operations and interactions for hospital administrators.
    Appointment
    Represents an appointment for a patient with a doctor.
    AppointmentCSVOperator
    The AppointmentCSVOperator class handles operations related to reading from and writing to the appointment data CSV file.
    AppointmentCtrl
    Interface for managing appointments.
    AppointmentOutcomeRecord
    Represents the outcome of a medical appointment, including details such as prescribed medications, service type, prescription status, and consultation notes.
    AppointmentOutcomeRecordCtrl
    Interface for managing appointment outcome records.
    CSVoperator
    An abstract class that defines operations for reading, adding, changing, and deleting lines in CSV files.
    Doctor
    Represents a doctor in the system.
    DoctorCSVOperator
    This class provides methods for reading, writing, updating, and deleting records in a CSV file specifically related to doctor data.
    DoctorCtrl
    Controller class that handles the doctor's medical record, appointment scheduling, personal schedule management, and other related functions.
    DoctorInput
    This class is responsible for handling input operations for the Doctor.
    GetOperationInput
    Interface for handling the input of operations.
    HospitalApp
    The HospitalApp class serves as the entry point for the Hospital NTU Management System.
    IDocAppointmentCtrl
    Interface for controlling doctor appointment-related operations.
    IGetOperationInput
    Interface representing an operation input handler for a system.
    IMedicineView
    Interface for viewing medication-related information.
    InventoryManagement
    Interface for managing inventory-related operations for medications.
    IPatientList
    The IPatientList interface provides a method for viewing patient IDs.
    ISchedule
    Interface for managing scheduling operations.
    ISubmitReplenishRequest
    Interface for submitting replenish requests.
    IViewAppointment
    Interface for viewing appointments.
    LoginCtrl
    Handles user authentication for the hospital management system.
    MainCtrl
    The main controller for handling user operations within the hospital management system.
    MedicalRecord
    Represents a patient's medical record in the system.
    MedicalRecordCSVOperator
    This class provides methods for reading, modifying, and managing medical record data in a CSV file.
    MedicalRecordCtrl
    Interface for managing medical records.
    Medicine
    Represents a medication item in the hospital inventory.
    MedicineCSVOperator
    This class provides methods for managing medicine records in a CSV file.
    Patient
    Represents a Patient in the hospital management system.
    PatientCtrl
    PatientCtrl is responsible for managing patient-related operations, including viewing and updating medical records, scheduling appointments, and viewing available slots for doctors.
    PatientInput
    The PatientInput class is responsible for handling the operations related to patient interactions in the system.
    PersonalSchedule
    Represents a doctor's personal schedule and provides methods for managing and viewing their schedule.
    PharmacistCtrl
    The PharmacistCtrl class provides functionality to manage appointments, appointment outcome records, and medication inventory for a pharmacist in a hospital.
    PharmacistInput
    Handles the input and menu interactions for the pharmacist role within the hospital management system.
    ResetPasswordCtrl
    The ResetPasswordCtrl class is responsible for handling the process of resetting a user's password.
    Role
    Enumeration representing the various user roles in the hospital management system.
    ShowAdministratorMenu
    Displays the menu options for the Administrator role in the hospital management system.
    ShowDoctorMenu
    Displays the menu options for the Doctor role in the hospital management system.
    ShowMenu
    Interface for displaying the menu options to users based on their role.
    ShowPatientMenu
    Class to display the menu options for patients.
    ShowPharmacistMenu
    Class to display the menu options for pharmacists.
    StaffCSVOperator
    This class provides methods for managing staff records in a CSV file.
    StaffManagement
    Interface for managing staff information and operations.
    User
    Represents a user within the system, with attributes related to their hospital identity, role, and personal details.
